columns.StuID: The unique identifier for each student.
columns.Fname: The first name of the student.
columns.LName: The last name of the student.
columns.Age: The age of the student in years.
columns.Major: The student's major field of study.
columns.Advisor: The unique identifier for the student's academic advisor.
columns.city_code: The code representing the student's city of residence.

Student.table_description: The table stores information about students in the database.

columns.StuID: The unique identifier for each student voting.
columns.Registration_Date: The date the student registered to vote.
columns.Election_Cycle: The term indicating the election period.
columns.President_Vote: The vote cast for the presidential candidate.
columns.Vice_President_Vote: The vote cast for the vice presidential candidate.
columns.Secretary_Vote: The vote cast for the secretary candidate.
columns.Treasurer_Vote: The vote cast for the treasurer candidate.
columns.Class_President_Vote: The vote cast for the class president candidate.
columns.Class_Senator_Vote: The vote cast for the class senator candidate.

Voting_record.table_description: The table records students' votes for various election positions.
